product_name: LancomeCare and Glow Hydrating Serum Concealer
summary: SummaryA multi-use, up to 24 Hydrating Serum Concealer, with medium buildable coverage and a natural soft glow finish. With an 81% serum base skin-loving formula, Lancôme's multi-use concealer is best for brightening, blurring under eye dark circles, and enhancing features for an everyday natural look.
details: DetailsBenefitsMedium, buildable coverage​Creamy liquid texture​Natural Soft Glow Finish​Easy to blend & use​Crease-resistant for up to 12hr​Skin-infused formula​Up to 81% serum baseFeatures81% serum base skin-loving formula BrighteningBlurrs under eye dark circlesEnhances features for a everyday natural lookCreamy formulaBlendableMult-use applicatorNo creasing or caking for up to 12-hoursKey IngredientsHyaluronic acid for hydrationCeramides + peptides to protect & strengthen the skin barrierItem 2615607How To UseConceal & Spot Correct:Use a shade that matches your skin tone to cover any discoloration, pigmentation, and blemishes.Brighten & Blur:Use a shade 1-2 shades lighter than your skin tone for the under eye area. Will help to minimize the appearance of fine lines and create an eye lifting effect.Brontour:Use a shade 203 shades deeper than your skin tone to sculpt/warm complexionAll Over Coverage:Use a shade that matches your skin tone for a minimal makeup look, touch ups, or pair with your favorite foundation.IngredientsAu, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Glycerin, Propanediol, Propylene Glycol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil, Citrus Junos Fruit Extract, Tin Oxide, Cera Microcristallina / Microcrystalline Wax / Cire Microcristalline, Paraffin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Silica Silylate, Salicyloyl Phytosphingosine, Alumina, Aluminum Hydroxide, Magnesium Sulfate, Carnosine, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Synthetic Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Butylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, [+/- May Contain / Peut Contenir CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide], (F.I.L. N70025130/1).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Conceal & Spot Correct:Use a shade that matches your skin tone to cover any discoloration, pigmentation, and blemishes.Brighten & Blur:Use a shade 1-2 shades lighter than your skin tone for the under eye area. Will help to minimize the appearance of fine lines and create an eye lifting effect.Brontour:Use a shade 203 shades deeper than your skin tone to sculpt/warm complexionAll Over Coverage:Use a shade that matches your skin tone for a minimal makeup look, touch ups, or pair with your favorite foundation.
ingredients: Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil
Cera Microcristallina / Microcrystalline Wax / Cire Microcristalline

reviews.headline: Great for older skin
reviews.comments: I am 56 - this product is fabulous.  I use Lancome pearls under eye, first, then moisturize, then follow with this.  It does not dry or accentuate under eye wrinkles and bags - and it cleans off easily.  I have sensitive eyes - no issues, here.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I got lucky picking the correct shade since all of the staff was too busy socializing to assist me

reviews.headline: Not what I was expecting
reviews.comments: I was hoping for it to be more hydrating

reviews.headline: honestly love this product
reviews.comments: its the only shade that actually fit me. i didnt think i was pale since im asian but 120n was a perfect shade match! i wanted something i could use without a foundation with a very skin like finish. it doesnt look cakey on my dry skin and doesnt make my skin peel. only downside is the cost, which isnt super college student friendly.

reviews.headline: Coverage
reviews.comments: Good coverage for the days i want coverage under my eyes.

reviews.headline: great color
reviews.comments: I was looking for a better concealer and shade then I had. I love the color and it blends well. It is smooth but needs to be worn with an eye primer, as it's very light. With my colored eye primer this concealer stays on all day.

reviews.headline: So beautiful & skin like
reviews.comments: I needed a new concealer and decided to try this when it was on sale. I love it and am amazed every time I use it. It is so skin like and feels/looks so natural while still giving coverage. I have dry skin and its not patchy on me. This is by no means full coverage which is great for me. I do wish there was a pink cool tone for fair/light skin as it is a little warm on me.

reviews.headline: So beautiful & skin like
reviews.comments: I needed a new concealer and decided to try this when it was on sale. I love it and am amazed every time I use it. It is so skin like and feels/looks so natural while still giving coverage. I have dry skin and its not patchy on me. This is by no means full coverage which is great for me. I do wish there was a pink cool tone for fair/light skin as it is a little warm on me.

reviews.headline: Pleasant surprise
reviews.comments: All I can say is that this concealer quietly cover and conceal. This is not hyped up commercially or in advertisement but it's doing a good job. Not brightening or caking, it's just subtly conceal.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: The packaging is nice, it's glass and feels luxe. The consistency of the concealer is very thin. The applicator doe head dispenses a lot of product. I don't usually use a ton of concealer, and this applicator puts out way too much. The concealer doesn't work well with my eye cream. I've tried applying right away and I've tried waiting to apply the concealer after my eye cream. Neither works well, the concealer pills up and always sits in my fine lines under my eyes. The best application so far has been to not use eye cream but it still sits in my fine lines.

reviews.headline: Beware chemical burns!
reviews.comments: This concealer does not cover dark circles and left horrible red burn and dry under eyes. Would give zero stars, but wont allow me to. Do nut buy.

reviews.headline: its ok
reviews.comments: it is good as a light foundation but not good as a concealer. it made my dark circles worse. but I love it as a foundation

reviews.headline: I would definitely purchase this foundation again!
reviews.comments: Lancome Care and Glow Hydrating Serum Concealer.  It is now my new favorite!  I have dry skin and some lines under my eyes.  I've used other concealers and only made my lines stand out more.  Not with this concealer I highly recommend it!!!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Nice smooth, texture. Easy to blend and doesn't crease. Feels good in this dry climate. I thought the shade might be too light, but it's perfect

reviews.headline: It's ok, not wow
reviews.comments: I bought shade 310N because I used the find your shade option, the shade turned out to be too dark. It is light coverage and it is more toward the liquid side.

reviews.headline: Dry mature skin? This is the one
reviews.comments: I just wanna say, its not oily. Its just not for your skin type. Ive been using the old tient concealer and the it cosmetics  serum concealer bc those are really good too. But this is the one for me. Its the most serum in concealer, concealer, that ive used yet. Lamcome doesnt miss in my opinion. I love it. If you need  extra moisture this is for you. If uou are an oily girlie then probably not. Just stick to regular concealer.

reviews.headline: Good for mature skin
reviews.comments: I'm 54. I struggle to find a concealer for my mature skin. This concealer did the job! I love it! Gives me a nice glow. I even use it to cover acne spots and blend it as a foundation throughout. Would purchase again.

reviews.headline: Finally!
reviews.comments: Love that this feels more like a serum, than a thick, dry concealer.  It goes on beautifully, and that's saying something! Because makeup looks & feels horrible on me.. But this feels great. I got 120N and 305N. I use them together for a perfect match. I add a little dot on my cheeks, and it evens out my skin tone and makes it look like i have a little makeup on. LOVE IT.

reviews.headline: Breakouts galore!
reviews.comments: Not only does this have terrible coverage for undereyes, this is absolutely not good if you are prone to breakouts. I applied this to areas that needed coverage, and the very next day noticed TONS of whiteheads in only the places I applied it. It's moisturizing, but that's it.

reviews.headline: Perfect for no makeup/ makeup days!
reviews.comments: My new go to concealer! I oicked it uo during the sale and absolutely feel in love! It doesnt crease and lasts for hours. I especially love using it in my no makeup/makeup days

media.headline: Everything that I need under my eye in one product
media.caption: Registered on site to write review because I love this concealer!:)

media.headline: Coverage was good but clogged pores
media.caption: 1st using full size GÉNIFIQUE/2nd using products from gift box

faceoff_positive.comments:
This concealer serum is the most used product under my
eyes! It gives me a good coverage, hydration, natural glowing skin finish. Beautiful luxury looking package, skincare ingredients, and pleasure to use!
faceoff_positive.headline: Everything that I need under my eye in one product

faceoff_negative.comments: Good coverage but skin has become blemish prone!! before using the products in this gorgeous gift box my skin was very healthy and balanced. i've used Lancome skin care since my early 20s
faceoff_negative.headline: Coverage was good but clogged pores
